documentation.text: @title Contract for Liars Dice single hand version of the game
@dev number of dice given initially per player
@dev All the money from will be tranfered to this account.

@dev app fron end can check this and call functions to other players reveled dice so 
 that they can  be diplayed to player
@dev number of players that need to be join to start the game
@dev number of players that are still in the game
@dev current round number
@dev the amount each player has to pay to play the game.
@dev Front end app shows this by concatenating with string player (instead of address show as player 1, player 2 etc)
@dev players list player at pos 0 will strat the first bid and turns go in clock wise direction.
@dev Info associated with players for all players
@dev stores the number of dice with that face value, updated after getting unHashed face value from each player

@notice Function returns the amount present in the contract address balance. 
 @return returns conntract balance

@notice Function Front end app call to see number of players that are still in the game 
 @return returns number of players currently  in the game

@notice Function Front end app call to diplay current round number .
 @return returns round number.

@notice Function Front end app call to check the turn.
 @return returns if its this player turn. Based on this app should show bid/challenge options to player.

@notice Function Front end app call to diplay amount player has to pay to enter the game.    
 @return returns amount in wei

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Function cannot be called at this time."

arguments.value: Function cannot be called at this time.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Function cannot be called at this time."

documentation.text:
@dev Validates if a perticuler function can be called at a given stage of the game
 @dev _stage:  list of stages in which a perticuler function call is allowed

@dev After a player bids/challenges determines who would be the next player allowed to bid/challenge.
 PlayerList an array of address is used as a circuler buffer to determine the turn. If a perticuler player
 at a position is eliminated from game then address is set to 0. If we ended up wit same position 
 as original position that means all other players are eliminated and that was marked with a high number 255.
@dev Function to check if revealed face values matches with hashed values sent before

@dev Function to check if bid came as per current rules i.e increase face value or increase in number of dices 
 with same face value or increase in both. 
 currently no penalty for sending invalid bid. simply he won't be the person that wins/looses based on the 
 next person's challenge result.

@dev Function to determine looser based on reveled rolls of all players and by considering one as wildcard
 looser will loose one dice and starts the next round. If he looses all dice then next player will start the round.

arguments.value: Already joined the game

arguments.value: Not enough money sent to join game

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Not enough money sent to join game"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Please send all your dice values"

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Please send all your dice values"

@notice front end app should call this function when stage is receiveHashedRoll after making player roll the dice
 @param hashed: hashed values of player's  all dice face values.

 if player opted to challenge previous bid

@dev players list player at pos 0 will strat the first bid and turns go in clock wise direction.
@dev Info associated with players for all players

@dev Validates if a perticuler function can be called at a given stage of the game
 @dev _stage:  list of stages in which a perticuler function call is allowed

@dev After a player bids/challenges determines who would be the next player allowed to bid/challenge.
 PlayerList an array of address is used as a circuler buffer to determine the turn. If a perticuler player
 at a position is eliminated from game then address is set to 0. If we ended up wit same position 
 as original position that means all other players are eliminated and that was marked with a high number 255.
@dev Function to check if revealed face values matches with hashed values sent before

@dev Function to check if bid came as per current rules i.e increase face value or increase in number of dices 
 with same face value or increase in both. 
 currently no penalty for sending invalid bid. simply he won't be the person that wins/looses based on the 
 next person's challenge result.

@dev Function to determine looser based on reveled rolls of all players and by considering one as wildcard
 looser will loose one dice and starts the next round. If he looses all dice then next player will start the round.

 @return returns list of player's ids(positions) that are still in game

documentation.text: @notice Bid losers call this function to get their money back
@notice  Fallback function to receive any transfers

params.cost: : amount of wei that each player should pay to play game
params.noOfPlayers: : number of players needed to start the game

returns._0: returns list of player's ids(positions) that are still in game
faceValue: dice face value bid by player numDice: number of dice with that face value playerId: id of the palyer from whom this bid was received.
stage: returns current stage of the game as enum.  initial = 0, receiveHashedRoll=1,bid =2,bid_challenge= 3, challenge=4,receiveRevealedRoll=5,endGame=6
returns number of players currently  in the game

params.playerPos: : id/pos sent as part of getActivePlayerLIst call should be used

returns._0: returns list of face values of players dice.
winnerId: return current round winner. when single player is left, this contains game winner. value 255 should be read as None.
returns if its this player turn. Based on this app should show bid/challenge options to player.

params.hashed: : hashed values of player's  all dice face values.

params.numDice: : number of dice in the current game wit that face value.

params.secret: : secret used to come up with hashed value sent before.

deployer.details: All the money from will be tranfered to this account.

gameCost.details: the amount each player has to pay to play the game.

numActivePlayers.details: number of players that are still in the game

numPlayers.details: number of players that need to be join to start the game

numSetDice.details: number of dice given initially per player

playerList.details: players list player at pos 0 will strat the first bid and turns go in clock wise direction.

players.details: Info associated with players for all players

revealUpdateReady.details: app fron end can check this and call functions to other players reveled dice so  that they can  be diplayed to player

rollFaceValues.details: stores the number of dice with that face value, updated after getting unHashed face value from each player

stage.details: Current stage of the game, fron end apps should call appropriate functions based on stage and display  relavent info to players like showing other players dice after challenge, Ask users to roll, bid/challenge (in addition to getting the turn info)

winnerPlayerPos.details: Front end app shows this by concatenating with string player (instead of address show as player 1, player 2 etc)

devdoc.title: Contract for Liars Dice single hand version of the game

balanceof().notice: Function returns the amount present in the contract address balance.

getActivePlayerLIst().notice: front end app should call this to display players that are still in game

getCurrentBidInfo().notice: Function Front end app call this function to get current bid information

getCurrentRound().notice: Function Front end app call to diplay current round number .

getGameCost().notice: Function Front end app call to diplay amount player has to pay to enter the game.

getGameStage().notice: Function Front end app call to get game stage.

getNumActivePlayers().notice: Function Front end app call to see number of players that are still in the game

getPlayerReveal(uint8).notice: front end app should call this to display player's dice values after challenge

getWinnerPlayerId().notice: Function Front end app call this function to show winner. shows this by concatenating with string player (instead of address, player 1 , player 2 will be shown)

isRevealUpdateReady().notice: Function Front end app call this function to see if all the players  revealed their roll after a challenge. And can call getActivePlayerLIst and getPlayerReveal to update dashboard.

ismyTurn().notice: Function Front end app call to check the turn.

joinGame().notice: Players join by calling joinGame by sending the gameCost money in msg.value

recvHashedRoll(bytes32[]).notice: front end app should call this function when stage is receiveHashedRoll after making player roll the dice

sendBid(uint8,uint8).notice: front end app should call this function when the stage is bid or bid_challenge  to send the bid from the player who got the current turn.

sendChallenge().notice: front end app should call this function when the stage is bid_challenge  if player opted to challenge previous bid

sendNonHashedRoll(uint256[],uint256).notice: front end app should call this function when the stage is challenge to reveal all the dice face values of current roll.

withDrawMoney().notice: Bid losers call this function to get their money back
